title: New: Gambles – A Song For Jeff Bauman Jr.
body:
An image that words betray.

A song for Jeff Bauman Jr. and for Boston. Sheer beauty. Speechless.

‘give me back my yesterday / before this night turns morning’

excerpt.full: An image that words betray. A song for Jeff Bauman Jr. and for Boston. Sheer beauty. Speechless. ‘give me back my yesterday / before this night turns morning’

An image that words betray.

A song for Jeff Bauman Jr.
